verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Onward Christian soldiers,
Marching as to war

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
With the cross of Jesus,
Going on before

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Onward Christian soldiers, Marching as to war
With the cross of Jesus, going on before!

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Christ the royal Master, Leads against the foe;
Forward into the battle, See His banner go

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
At the sign of triumph, Satan's host doth flee;
On, then, Christian soldiers, On, to victory

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Hell's foundation quiver, At the shout of praise
Brother's lift your voices, Loud your anthems raise!

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Like a mighty army Moves the Church of God; Brothers, we are treading
Where the saints have trod.

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
We are not divided, all one body we
One in hope and doctrine, one in charity

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Onward then, ye people, join our happy throng
Blend with ours your voices

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
In the triumph song, Glory, laud and honor
Unto Christ the King, This thru countless ages Men and angels sing
